info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 12:58PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Goliad and north central Bee Counties through 130 PM CST... At 1257 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Normanna, or 9 miles north of Beeville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Normanna, Pettus, Berclair and Tuleta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 576 and 588. US Highway 59 between mile markers 680 and 690. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
